description:
Narita Shion is one of http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama]`s classmates who is also a clean freak, but hides it to not draw attention. He likes to play online games, specifically Monstrosity Hunter, because online world is where he does not need to worry about being dirty. He`s plays in the same party with Aoyama in that game.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Narita Shion
